column5: hey guys just wondering if i can get any conditions of the niagara whirlpool for tomorrow ....  thanks a bunch  jus that it's an hours drive and if it' not worth it i would really appreciate the info!!  thanks!!!!

well with the warming conditions I think the shore ice would be very unsafe.....this year it is very uneven, its not really a cliff like most years.  Was fishing Fort Erie tonight and there was ice flows coming down which will end up getting stuck in the whirlpool for a few a day or so. Personally I wouldn't venture down there for safety reasons with the ice!
